visual_elements.description: A key explaining line types and shaded areas: 'Curb' (thick solid line), 'Lot line' (dashed line), 'Sidewalk' (hatched rectangle), 'Required setbacks' (thin solid line), 'Buildable area' (light gray shaded area).

Figure A: 'Flag lot'. Shows a rectangular lot with a narrow access strip to the street. It has a 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', and 'Interior-side yard' on both sides. An arrow indicates 'Front lot line is closest and most parallel to street.' Another arrow points to a 10' setback, stating 'Front setback is 10' instead of 20''. The buildable area is shaded.

Figure B: 'Corner lot'. Shows a rectangular lot at a street corner. It has a 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', 'Interior-side yard', and 'Streetside yard'. A dimension line indicates a 16' setback from the streetside. The buildable area is shaded.

Figure C: 'Substandard Corner lot w/frontage < 50''. Shows a rectangular lot at a street corner, similar to B but with a smaller frontage. It has a 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', 'Interior-side yard', and 'Streetside yard'. An arrow indicates 'Street side setback is 10' instead of 16''. Another arrow points to the front lot line, stating 'Front lot line is shortest of the two frontages.' A 10' setback is shown from the streetside. The buildable area is shaded.

Figure D: 'Through lot'. Shows a rectangular lot with access to two parallel streets. It has a 'Front yard' on both street sides, 'Rear yard' in the middle, and 'Interior-side yard' on both sides. The buildable area is shaded.

Figure E: 'Wedge shaped lot'. Shows a pie-shaped lot at a curved street. It has a 'Front yard' along the curved street and 'Interior-side yard' along the radial lot lines. A note explains: 'Wedge shaped lots don't have rear lot lines. The rear yard is determined by a 20' radius from intersection of side lot lines.' The buildable area is shaded.
Figure F: 'Lot with more than 4 sides'. Shows an irregular polygonal lot. It has a 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', and 'Interior-side yard'. The buildable area is shaded.

Figure G: 'Lot with more than 4 sides'. Shows an L-shaped lot. It has a 'Front yard', 'Rear yard', and 'Interior-side yard'. A note explains: 'Rear lot line is farthest and most parallel to street.' The buildable area is shaded.

technical_specifications.parameter: Rear yard determination radius (Wedge shaped lot)
